extensionDescription.message: Deletes all cookies from domains, not added to the provided whitelist, as soon as you exit your browser.

general_headline.description: Headline for the general settings in option page

general_description.message: Enable the first checkbox as soon as you configured your whitelist below. The second checkbox is optional but should be enabled for proper tracking protection.
general_description.description: Description for the general settings section

clearcookies_label.message: Delete cookies, except from whitelisted domains, when Firefox is closed
clearcookies_label.description: Used in the options page for the clear cookies checkbox

clearstorage_label.message: Delete localStorage and indexedDB, for all domains, when Firefox is closed
clearstorage_label.description: Used in the options page for the clear storage checkbox

whitelist_headline.description: Headline for the domain whitelist in option page

whitelist_description.message: Add domains to your whitelist by enabling the checkbox to its left.

domain_column.description: Whitelist headline for the domain column

cookies_column.description: Whitelist headline for the cookie counter column
